nodes.text: Talpini were a sentient species native to Tal Pi. Weeteef Cyu-Bee was a member of this species.
The Talpini species had brown, orange, or lightly colored skin and had brown, orange, gray, or white colored hair. The Talpini's small size let them conceal themselves easily among taller beings.
The Talpini hailed from Tal Pi.
During a mission to Ord Mantell undertaken by the bounty hunter Jango Fett, a Talpini was present at a restaurant.
During the Imperial Era, a Talpini served the Pantoran criminal Dvorad. During a heist on Hovun IV, the Talpini tried to shoot at Tobias Beckett but ended up killing himself.
Whereas Han Solo and Chewbacca were searching for the lost treasure of Rane Mahal, a Talpini was present at the droid museum located on Nubia.
Weeteef Cyu-Bee, a male Talpini, served as one of the most destructive members of the Partisans, led by Saw Gerrera.

Several months after the Battle of Endor, a Talpini was present at Takodana Castle when Han Solo rendezvous with an Imperial defector named Ralsius Paldora, who had intelligence crucial to the Liberation of Kashyyyk.
"Steely Carl", a male Talpini, worked as a guard for Oga Garra on the planet Batuu.
